segments.text: Whoa, that sink is overflowing big time!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading down like a waterfall in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lady's right there, focused on her dish towel and plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea her foot's in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of dishes sit innocently on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Looking left, the cabinet's open with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A kid's climbing the stool to snag some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting, but he's determined, holding a plate too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl's beside him, arm up for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're pulling off this sneaky operation so quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a lovely garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight makes the whole room feel warm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect to see such mischief in a simple kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's kind of adorable, the kids' excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that water... yeah, that's a surprise too.
segments.speaker: PAR
